OOC: Since when does Megatron have any controle on the ship. It ws are
base, and we have complete computer control. Dark Mouse only gave *us*
the command codes. And any you had would have been changed. So its not
really possible for you to do all that you said, without big time
moding. I suggest we wait for Yanshosh to get online before we continue
with this.
